prompt.0: Imagine you are a professional translator with years of experience. Your task is to translate the following German text into English without asking any questions or providing further explanations: "Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Your specialty is to translate texts from one language into another precisely and while maintaining the original tone, using direct translations. source_text.0: Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben.

hypothesis.0:
Translating the text in the given instruction, the translation is as follows: "Approximately 1,400 officers have arrested six suspected thieves at the start of the carnival, and are now investigating them for several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact numbers of criminality at the start of the carnival will be given in the next week." 
The best answer is: Approximately 1,400 officers have arrested six suspected thieves at the start of the carnival, and are now investigating them for several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact numbers of criminality at the start of the carnival will be given in the next week.

reference_text.0: The approximately 1,400 deployed officers have therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now also investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact crime figures for the session's opening day will be available next week.
